abstract: Nick Calio shaped Citigroup’s political strategy as the bank came under harsh scrutiny from lawmakers
snippet: Nick Calio shaped Citigroup’s political strategy as the bank came under harsh scrutiny from lawmakers
lead_paragraph: 1:08 p.m. | Updated After seven tumultuous years as head of Citigroup’s government affairs group, Nicholas Calio is stepping down to become the chief lobbyist for the airline industry.
